name: Air Munich Aviation - Flightschool & Charter
about: Air Munich Aviation, located at the Jesenwang airfield in Germany, offers professional and successful flight training with a team of competent and experienced flight instructors. With over 30 years of experience, our instructors have accumulated countless flight hours on a variety of aircraft types. We provide modern training equipment, on-site maintenance staff, and a demanding airfield that prepares pilots for any flying condition. Our training programs include PPL, CPL, and ATPL licenses, with flexible scheduling and cost transparency. We also offer trial flights, plane tours, and the option to charter our aircraft after training. Our unique airfield, beautifully landscaped and challenging, attracts pilots from across Europe. At Air Munich Aviation, we ensure safe and comprehensive training to help you achieve your aviation goals.
